trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SQL string that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control uses to update data in the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 SQL 字串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref>控制項使用更新基礎資料庫中的資料。

trans-unit.source: The UpdateCommand represents an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, and is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: UpdateCommand 代表 SQL 查詢或預存程序的名稱，並且由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 由於不同的資料庫產品使用不同種類的 SQL，SQL 字串的語法取決於目前 ADO.NET 提供者正在使用中，以識別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SQL 字串是參數型的查詢或命令，參數的預留位置也取決於所使用的 ADO.NET 提供者。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the provider is the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=fullName>, which is the default provider for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果提供者是<xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=fullName>，這是預設提供者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>類別，參數的預留位置是`'@parameterName'`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, if the provider is set to the <xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName>, the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果提供者設定為<xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName>，參數的預留位置是`'?'`。</xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用參數與 SqlDataSource 控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The UpdateCommand property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源支援預存程序，UpdateCommand 屬性可以是 SQL 字串或預存程序的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The UpdateCommand property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.UpdateCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: UpdateCommand 屬性委派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.UpdateCommand%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>與其相關聯物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.UpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > For security purposes, the UpdateCommand property is not stored is view state.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 屬性並未存放 UpdateCommand 基於安全性目的，是檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Because it is possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the database structure in view state could result in an information disclosure vulnerability.
trans-unit.target: 很可能在用戶端上檢視狀態的內容進行解碼，因為檢視中儲存機密資訊的資料庫結構狀態可能會導致資訊洩漏的弱點。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數不需要驗證，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering> event to validate parameter values before executing the query.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering>事件來執行查詢之前驗證參數值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[指令碼擅用概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An SQL string that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> uses to update data.
trans-unit.target: SQL 字串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref>用來更新資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand*> property is an SQL statement or the name of a stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand*>屬性是 SQL 陳述式或預存程序的名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand*>

trans-unit.source: The UpdateCommandType property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.UpdateCommandType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: UpdateCommandType 屬性委派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.UpdateCommandType%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>與其相關聯物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.UpdateCommandType%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an update operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 更新作業完成時發生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the Updated event to examine the values of output parameters after an update operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 處理更新作業已完成之後，請檢查輸出參數的值已更新事件。

trans-unit.source: The output parameters are available from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object that is associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 輸出參數都是從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>與事件相關聯的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand*> property from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView"></xref> control that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得參數集合，其中包含所使用的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand*>屬性從<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView"></xref>相關聯的控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A> property contains a parameterized SQL query, the UpdateParameters collection contains any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A>屬性包含參數化的 SQL 查詢、 UpdateParameters 集合包含任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>對應於 SQL 字串中的參數預留位置的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Parameter names might be affected by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A> property, specifically if the name identifies a primary key, such as a key specified using the `DataKeyNames` property of the data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions> value and a set of `oldValues` are passed to the corresponding data method.
trans-unit.target: 參數名稱可能會受到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>屬性，特別是如果此名稱會識別主索引鍵，例如使用指定的索引鍵`DataKeyNames`屬性，將資料繫結控制項，或在刪除和更新案例其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions>值和一組`oldValues`會傳遞至相對應的資料方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，格式字串套用至每個參數名稱`oldValues`集合。

trans-unit.source: The order of the parameters in the UpdateParameters collection might be important, depending on the ADO.NET provider.
trans-unit.target: UpdateParameters 集合中的參數的順序可能會很重要，根據的 ADO.NET 提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=fullName> providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=fullName>提供者將出現在參數化 SQL 查詢中參數的順序根據集合中的參數產生關聯。</xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=fullName> provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=fullName>提供者，這是預設的 ADO.NET 提供者的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項，將產生關聯，parameters 集合中的 SQL 查詢中的預留位置別名參數的名稱相符。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需參數化的 SQL 查詢和命令的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用參數與 SqlDataSource 控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The UpdateParameters property retrieves the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.UpdateParameters%2A> property that is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: UpdateParameters 屬性擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.UpdateParameters%2A>屬性所包含的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>與其相關聯物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.UpdateParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Values are inserted into parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數不需要驗證，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering> event to validate parameter values before executing the query.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering>事件來執行查詢之前驗證參數值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Filtering>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> that contains the parameters used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含所使用的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before an update operation.
trans-unit.target: 更新作業之前發生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the Updating event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control performs the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 處理更新事件，以執行額外的初始化作業專屬於您的應用程式，來驗證參數的值，或若要變更參數值之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項執行更新作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called.
trans-unit.target: 基礎資料來源的連接尚未開啟時，會呼叫事件處理常式委派。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot directly cancel the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A> database operation by calling the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Cancel%2A> method on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object that is exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您無法直接取消<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>資料庫作業，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Cancel%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>所公開的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以不過，將資料庫作業取消藉由設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>至`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 值插入參數不需要驗證，可能會造成安全性威脅。
